mapper.select: SELECT m_prj_project.id AS prjId, m_prj_project.name, m_prj_project.lead AS assignUser, m_prj_project.shortname AS prjKey,m_prj_project.planStartDate AS startDate, m_prj_project.planEndDate AS endDate, m_prj_project.projectStatus AS status, m_prj_project.id AS id, m_prj_project.actualStartDate, m_prj_project.actualEndDate,m_prj_project.sAccountId, m_prj_project.deadline, concat(s_user.firstname, ' ', LTRIM(concat(IFNULL(s_user.middlename, ''), ' ')), s_user.lastname) AS assignUserFullName, s_user.avatarId AS assignUserAvatarId, 'Project' AS type FROM m_prj_project LEFT OUTER JOIN s_user ON (m_prj_project.owner = s_user.username) LEFT OUTER JOIN m_prj_milestone ON (m_prj_project.id = m_prj_milestone.projectid) WHERE m_prj_project.id IN #repeat($_parameter.projectIds $projectId "," "(" ")") @{projectId} #end ORDER BY ISNULL(m_prj_milestone.ganttindex), m_prj_milestone.ganttindex ASC, m_prj_project.planStartDate ASC, m_prj_project.planEndDate ASC

SELECT m_prj_milestone.projectid AS prjId, m_prj_milestone.name, m_prj_milestone.owner AS assignUser, m_prj_milestone.startdate AS startDate, m_prj_milestone.enddate AS endDate, m_prj_milestone.status, m_prj_milestone.id, m_prj_milestone.actualstartdate AS actualStartDate, m_prj_milestone.actualenddate AS actualEndDate, m_prj_milestone.deadline, m_prj_milestone.ganttindex, concat(s_user.firstname, ' ', LTRIM(concat(IFNULL(s_user.middlename, ''), ' ')), s_user.lastname) AS assignUserFullName, s_user.avatarId AS assignUserAvatarId, 'Project-Milestone' AS type FROM m_prj_milestone LEFT OUTER JOIN s_user ON (m_prj_milestone.owner = s_user.username) WHERE m_prj_milestone.projectid = @{prjId} ORDER BY ISNULL(m_prj_milestone.ganttindex), m_prj_milestone.ganttindex ASC, m_prj_milestone.startdate ASC, m_prj_milestone.enddate ASC
